name: Config 2021 Name Card & Agenda Builder
description:
ðŸš¨Note: Organizations and teams only allow admins to publish to the Figma Community. To publish with your work account, duplicate to external teams and publish.


Since we canâ€™t meet in person, we wanted to find a way for you to meet other attendees virtually, so we worked with our Friends of Figma Community Advocates to create a Config 2021 Name Card template.


Duplicate and publish your remix to the community!


In this file you can find:

  • Your own customizable name card
  • Agenda builder
  • A place to collect cards from those you meet so you can stay connected
